name: Haruna (Kantai Collection / Kancolle)
description:
榛名は大丈夫です！

Read this before using the model I trained.

My one and only WAIFU. Trained on NAI.

Yeah, I know you can generate Haruna without using LoRA, but FFS that's very unstable and won't work on any mixed model newer than AOM2.

This is a test on expmix:

Now you get what I mean, right?

Trigger Words:

  • Weight: 0.8-1

  • Base:

    • Haruna \(Kancolle\), black hair, hairclips, gold eyes,

      • brown eyes maybe, but I like gold ones. If the elements mess up, try to lower Haruna \(Kancolle\) weight to 0.5-0.8 first.

  • OGoutfit:

    • HarunaOG, headgear, hairband, nontraditional miko, bare shoulders,

      wide sleeves, detached sleeves,

      waist bow, red skirt, hakama skirt, thighhigh, thighboots,

      • other words like sarashi, sideboob, zettai ryouiki can be used for typical angle.

  • Rain Season Outfit:

    • HarunaRain, white hairband,

      (green shirt:1.5), short sleeves,

      white skirt, pleated skirt,

      • bit overfitted, will generate umbrella sometime even put it in negative prompts, if it always happen, then change your base model to those prompt-based model like Anyv3/v5 or ExpMix. (Yeah, maybe those prompt-free model is easy to use, they are usually not good for LoRA.)

  • Causual Outfit (Mitsukoshi Collabo):

    • HarunaCausual, white hairband, anchor necklace, jewelry,

      (white jacket, open jacket:1.2), black shirt,

      long grey skirt, black pantyhose, black boots,

      • in some model it may mess up with the outfit below, you should try add (hoodie, open hoodie:1.5) in negative prompts.

  • Summer Outfit:

    • HarunaSummer, headgear, hairband, cleavage, collarbone,

      (white bikini, front-tie bikini:1.3),

      (white sarong:1.3),bare legs,

      • if you want the hoodie (the in-game illust) , replace the second line withwhite hoodie, if you keep both of them for half-open hoodie with bikini, it will mess up very often. I don't know how to fix it, but seems like topless will help.

  • Christmas Outfit:

    • HarunaSanta, headgear, hariband, santa costume, breasts, cleavage, red capelet, red dress, fur-trimmed dress, fur-trimmed capelet,

      fingerless gloves, red gloves,

      belt, red leg wear, bare legs,

      • not very stable. The lower dress will sometime mess up with OGoutfit's pleated skirt. Add pleated skirt, skirt, maybe help.
